column2: Digital filing under Section 9 has improved, but user support is lacking.
The provisions under Section 15 are unclear and need simplification for better compliance.
As a Lawyer, I find the filing process under Section 6 too complex.
Greater transparency should be introduced in Chapter 8.
There is a conflict between Section 5 and Article 12, which needs clarification.
There is ambiguity in Section 20, which may lead to litigation.
The provisions under Section 17 are unclear and need simplification for better compliance.
The provisions under Section 11 are unclear and need simplification for better compliance.
Digital filing under Section 11 has improved, but user support is lacking.
As a Independent Director, I find the filing process under Section 13 too complex.
Digital filing under Section 6 has improved, but user support is lacking.
There is a conflict between Section 2 and Article 15, which needs clarification.
Digital filing under Section 13 has improved, but user support is lacking.
